roleset.name: apply a label again

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: [The U.S.]-3 did manage to supply the Dutch with oil by PRO-3 relabeling supplies ; once oil is shipped , no one can tell its source . [

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to label.01.
